metadata.Title: CVE-2024-21908 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: TinyMCE versions before 5.9.0 are affected by a stored cross-site scriptingvulnerability. An unauthenticated and remote attacker could insert craftedHTML into the editor resulting in arbitrary JavaScript execution in anotheruser's browser.

criterions.comment: tinymce package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
